mdRecord.dcterms:title: Parc Montjuic, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Forestier, Jean-Claude Nicolas (French landscape architect, 1861-1930) [work]
Meyer, Elizabeth [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Park encompasses Palacio Nacional (now the Museu Nacional d'Art de Catalunya). 1929-30 Barcelona Exposition grounds designed by J.C.N. Forestier and Maria Rubio i Tudurí Nicolau; however, landscape left unfinished. Master plan for 1992 Olympic Ring by MBM, Arquitectos (Martorell, Bohigas, Mackay). [work]
